Mesosphere, Inc. (INTERN, VISA)

We're hiring for a number of positions in both our Hamburg, Germany and our San Francisco, CA offices:

+ UX Prototyper

+ Frontend Engineer

+ Distributed Applications Engineer

+ Distributed Systems Engineer

+ Linux Systems Engineer

+ Technical Writer

+ Solutions Architect

Full details are at http://mesosphere.io/jobs/, please apply online or email me at sunil@mesosphere.io for more information!

We're well funded, visa friendly, contribute extensively to open source (we're building products and services around the Apache Mesos project) and have great investors, advisors and engineers. Work ranges from Javascript to Python to Go to Scala to C++, depending on the layer of the stack and application to hand. Get in touch!
